# Get clade data
```{r}
clade1 <- subset(df,clade_I=="Clade I") %>% .$isolate_no
clade2 <- subset(df,clade_I!="Clade I") %>% .$isolate_no

subset_analysis_to_clade <- function(phenotype,cladeI,clustering){
  clustering_CI <- asr_cluster_analysis(clustering %>% subset(child_name %in% cladeI),remove_faux = TRUE) %>% mutate(clade = "Clade I")
  clustering_CII <- asr_cluster_analysis(clustering %>% subset(!child_name %in% cladeI),remove_faux = TRUE) %>% mutate(clade = "Clade II")
  rbind.data.frame(clustering_CI,clustering_CII )  %>% mutate(pheno = phenotype)
}

TMP_SMX <- subset_analysis_to_clade("TMP-SMX",clade1,TMP_SMX_asr_clustering)
gent <- subset_analysis_to_clade("Gentamicin",clade1,gentamicin_asr_clustering)
AMK <- subset_analysis_to_clade("Amikacin",clade1,AMK_asr_clustering)
CST <- subset_analysis_to_clade("Colistin",clade1,CST_asr_clustering)
blbli <- subset_analysis_to_clade("BL/BLI",clade1,blbli_asr_clustering) 

cluster_stats_clades <- rbind(TMP_SMX,gent,AMK,CST,blbli)
```

# Make supplemental table 
```{r}
stable5 <- cluster_stats_clades %>% select(pheno,clade,present,feature_frequency,phylogenetic_frequency,clustering_frequency,phylogenetic_events,singletons,clusters,cluster_isolates,cluster_size_median,cluster_size_range)
 
stable5$cluster_median_range <- paste0(stable5$cluster_size_median," (",stable5$cluster_size_range,")")
stable5 <- stable5%>% select(-cluster_size_median,-cluster_size_range) 

stable5 <- stable5 %>% `colnames<-`(c("Phenotype","Clade","No. NS","NS Frequency","Phylogenetic Frequency","Clustering Frequency","Phylogenetic Events","No. Singletons","No. Clusters","No. Cluster Isolates","Cluster Size, Median (Range)"))

stable5$`NS Frequency` <- paste0(stable5$`NS Frequency`,"%")
stable5$`Phylogenetic Frequency` <- paste0(stable5$`Phylogenetic Frequency`,"%")
stable5$`Clustering Frequency` <- paste0(stable5$`Clustering Frequency`,"%")
```
